HomePage.title: Screetner: Urban Asset Management Made Simple
HomePage.description: A cutting-edge street scanning system to help cities manage their infrastructure effortlessly.

urbanAssetTracking.title: Urban Asset Tracking
urbanAssetTracking.description: Monitor and manage urban infrastructure, such as roads, signs, and utilities, using our semi-automated tracking system.

streetScanning.title: Asset Scanning
streetScanning.description: Our system is designed for ease of use, allowing you to scan assets using just your mobile phone's camera.

reportingAnalytics.title: Reporting and Analytics
reportingAnalytics.description: After scanning assets, you can track reports and analyze the collected data through our website.
